title: gasMultiplier issue when Truffle 5.0.26 handles the private ttransaction to quorum
body:
- [ ] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.
---------------------------

## Issue
gasMultiplier issue when Truffle 5.0.26 handles the private transaction to quorum network

What the issue is, in broad strokes.
eth calls comparison between 5.0.26 and 5.0.8
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51973396/61069280-8a94a300-a3d1-11e9-967e-5a5f95d7a3f9.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51973396/61069329-a9933500-a3d1-11e9-9b33-66294023706a.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51973396/61069426-e2cba500-a3d1-11e9-97ee-3ed53afc0c85.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51973396/61069440-eceda380-a3d1-11e9-9ca1-f5b0e336148c.png)

So, we can see Truffle 5.0.8 is using default gasMultiplier value as 1.25, but truffle 5.0.26 is using 1.0 when autoGas is enabled.

Other consideration:
The estimateGas call in Quorum doesn't include the extra gas for private transaction
Quorum 2.2.2 has fixed that estimateGas issue #644 https://github.com/jpmorganchase/quorum/pull/644
Currently Azure Blockchain Service (ABS) is using Quorum 2.2.1

Workaround:
We can work around it by simply setting SimpleStorage.gasMultiplier = 2
or downgrade our truffle version from 5.0.26 to 5.0.8
but we still hope to report this issue.
